name: ignitee
description: PRD to GTM Strategy Platform - TypeScript Monorepo

scripts.build: pnpm --filter web build && pnpm --filter api build && pnpm --filter agent-orchestrator build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter web lint && pnpm --filter api lint
scripts.test: pnpm --filter web test && pnpm --filter api test
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && rm -rf services/*/node_modules
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter web type-check && pnpm --filter api type-check && pnpm --filter agent-orchestrator type-check
